text: Shocking broccoli in cold water Shocking is a cooking process wherein the food substance, usually a vegetable or fruit, is plunged into iced water or placed under cold running water to halt the cooking process.Ruhlman, Michael. 2013. BLANCHING, SHOCKING, REFRESHING == See also == * Blanching * Parboiling ==References== Category:Cooking techniques Category:Culinary terminology
title: Shocking (cooking)
